message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $120.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you coming down a bit.  I'm really interested in this product, but $120 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to go up to $100. What do you think?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $110. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for this amazing product.
